title: 2013  Manufactured 3 bedroom Home for Rent
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: Enjoy the comfort of your own space at Oakland Glens, a well-maintained, professionally managed manufactured home community; located on the Novi and Walled Lake border, Oakland Glens gets you direct access to so many great local offerings!
Public access to Walled Lake, shopping, dining and entertainment options all located with just a few miles.
This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is 1056 sq feet and sits on a perimeter site!
Call today to learn more about making this home your own — this one won't last long!
